about_the_game:
In this first person, horror, casual game, you have to protect your Teddy from the Two Bad Fellas. Find quickly a safe spot to hide your buddy and than move him to the next one. Explore the house and solve riddles but be aware, if you hold your Teddy for too long, you will be in big danger!

the dancers

The hideout

Your Teddy

The scientist

Salvation





In the dark scenario of "Two Bad Fellas," immerse yourself in a first-person horror experience where your sole mission is to protect your loyal friend, Teddy, from two mysterious antagonists. Explore a haunted house, solve puzzles, and find safe havens for your precious companion. But beware: if held for too long, your Teddy may attract unimaginable dangers!

FEATURES:
1. **Protect Your Furry Companion**: Face horror firsthand as you strive to protect your faithful friend, Teddy, from two wicked antagonists. Quickly find safe hideouts for your companion and move cautiously through the haunted house.

2. **Explore a Maze of Mysteries**: Immerse yourself in an intricate and mysterious house, where every room hides dark secrets and crucial clues for your survival. Solve puzzles and uncover the truth behind the nightmare that surrounds you.

3. **Multiple Difficulty Levels**: Challenge yourself with three distinct difficulty levels, tailoring the gaming experience to your preferences. Whether you're a novice seeking a relaxing adventure or a terror veteran looking for an extreme challenge, "Two Bad Fellas" offers a personalized experience for every player.

4. **Immersive Thrill Atmosphere**: Dive into an enveloping and tense atmosphere, enriched by an evocative soundtrack and unsettling sound effects. Every step you take, every breath you take, brings you closer to the heart of the horror surrounding you.

5. **A Gripping Story to Uncover**: Follow the journey of a young boy as he delves into a dark dream, searching for his lost mother. Confront your deepest fears and delve into the recesses of the protagonist's mind to uncover the truth behind his troubled reality.

Prepare for an unforgettable adventure, where courage and determination will be your only weapons against the forces of evil. Enter the world of "Two Bad Fellas" and confront terror with every fiber of your being.

name: Two Bad Fellas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-core o AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 420 / AMD Radeon HD 5450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Explore the house and solve riddles but be aware, if you hold your Teddy for too long, you will be in big danger!
